parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To go forward, advance. From pro and the base of basis; to walk forward, i.e. Advance.
Thence, from that place. From ekei; thence.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Two. A primary numeral; 'two'.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
The same as Iakob Graecized; Jacobus, the name of three Israelites.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Zebedee, father of the apostles James and John. Of Hebrew origin; Zebedaeus, an Israelite.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A ship, vessel, boat. From pleo; a sailer, i.e. Vessel.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Zebedee, father of the apostles James and John. Of Hebrew origin; Zebedaeus, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From kata and a derivative of artios; to complete thoroughly, i.e. Repair or adjust.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A fishing-net. Probably from a primary verb diko; a seine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
